message.body: I just went to Wegmans to pick up a redbox movie and some cake...and ended up meeting bobby flay
What was he doing at your wegmans
Yea he was there for a meet and greet thing
An I didn't have a ticket, but they let me just buy a cookbook and go meet him
Awesome, did David take that picture?
I know right. So random. It was already 15 minutes after he was supposed to leave so they wouldn't let him pose for a pic.

He was pretty nice I guess, he asked how I was doing, signed my book and I told him I loved his food and his shows and I'd been watching him since he was a challenger on the original iron chef and he laughed
And he said thanks have a good night and I left. Some random wegmans employee took that pic, David's at a race weekend in NJ with our friend Andrew this weekend
Although I doubt he'd be as excited

Probably not. But it was just so random, I was just standing in the store and over the intercom they say "anyone with a ticket who has not yet met Bobby Flay please go to the timber room across from the pub immediately"
So I walked over there and asked if I needed a ticket and they were like, no just buy this cookbook and we'll let you in
And you were like sweet,I like cookbooks
